description: Object containing detail for coded out amounts in the retrieved tax calculation.

totalPayeUnderpayments.description: The total coded out amount attributed to PAYE underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalSelfAssessmentUnderpayments.description: The total amount of Self Assessment underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalCollectedSelfAssessmentUnderpayment.description: The total amount collected for Self Assessment underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalUncollectedSelfAssessmentUnderpayme.description: The total amount of uncollected Self Assessment underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

payeUnderpaymentsDetail.description: Array containing details for PAYE-related underpayments in the retrieved tax calculation.

amount.description: Coded out amount attributed to PAYE underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

relatedTaxYear.description: The tax year this underpayment relates to. Format: YYYY-YY

selfAssessmentUnderpaymentsDetail.description: Array containing details about Self Assessment related underpayments in the retrieved tax calculation.

amount.description: The total coded out amount attributed to Self Assessment underpayments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

relatedTaxYear.description: The tax year this underpayment relates to. Format: YYYY-YY

collectedAmount.description: The amount of underpayment you have paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

uncollectedAmount.description: The outstanding amount you now need to pay. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
